text: Span is the width of a human hand, from the tip of the thumb to the tip of the pinky finger. ; 1 span := 9 inches := 0.2286 m In Slavic language, the analogue of span is pyad (peti, пядь). It is the width from the tip of the thumb to the tip of the forefinger. ; 1 pyad := 4 vershok := 7 inches := 0.1778 m Category:Units of length
title: Span (unit of length)
